table.rowClasses: row w-full my-8 border border-gray-300 shadow-md font-themeMontserrat transition-all flex flex-col flex-nowrap items-center justify-start lg:border-l-0 lg:border-r-0 lg:border-t-0 lg:border-b lg:py-3 lg:my-0 lg:shadow-none lg:flex-row lg:bg-white lg:hover:bg-gray-100
table.cellClasses: cell flex-grow w-full py-2 border-b border-gray-300 flex flex-row flex-nowrap items-center justify-center last:border-b-0 lg:py-0 lg:border-b-0 lg:border-r lg:first:border-l lg:first:border-t-0 lg:last:border-b-0
table.cellTitleClasses: cell-title w-1/2 px-4 py-2 border-r border-gray-300 text-center text-xxs font-semibold lg:hidden lg:w-full lg:border-r-0 lg:text-xs
table.cellValueClasses: cell-value w-1/2 px-2 py-1 text-center text-xxs lg:w-full
